comments:
This NPE happened whne I deleted a project which has a makefile openned in 
editor. But I couldn't reproduce it by doing the same thing.

Error 2005-08-04 11:44:31.740 Unable to create editor ID

See also bug 52279 and bug 41431.
While the root cause should be fixed in the platform (closing non-realized editors on project close and delete), the MakefileDocumentProvider could handle this case (restoring an editor for a non-existing resource) more gracefully.

Created an attachment (id=39522)
Avoid NPE if resource does not exist
